title: S3 Ep144: National News: Bruce Campbell Edition - Hr.1
itunes:title: National News: Bruce Campbell Edition - Hr.1
description: We kept this one simple!  BRUCE CAMPBELL IS ON THE SHOW TONIGHT, BABY!!  National Correspondent  Bree Sanders is up first to give us an abbrieviated National Strange and Supernatural Newscast.  Then, Bruce Campbell joins us to talk about his new movie, "My Name Is Bruce"!
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
dc:creator: Darkness Radio
